importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn., April 17, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) (the "Company" or "QXO") today announced the pricing of its previously announced public offering of 37,735,850 shares of its common stock (the "Offering") at a price to public of $13.25 per share. The Offering is expected to close on April 21, 2025, subject to customary closing conditions.
importantArticles.title: QXO Announces Pricing of Common Stock Offering

importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn., April 14, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) announced today that it is extending its all-cash tender offer to acquire all outstanding shares of Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) for $124.35 per share.
importantArticles.title: QXO Extends Tender Offer to Acquire Beacon Roofing Supply

importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn., April 14, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) announced today that it is extending its all-cash tender offer to acquire all outstanding shares of Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) for $124.35 per share.
importantArticles.title: QXO Extends Tender Offer to Acquire Beacon Roofing Supply

importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn., April 01, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) announced today that it is extending its all-cash tender offer to acquire all outstanding shares of Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) and amending the terms of its pending tender offer to reflect the terms of the previously announced definitive merger agreement between Beacon and QXO, including to increase the offer price to $124.35 per share in cash and reflect such other changes as contemplated by the merger agreement.
importantArticles.title: QXO Extends and Amends Tender Offer to Acquire Beacon Roofing Supply

importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn., April 01, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) announced today that it is extending its all-cash tender offer to acquire all outstanding shares of Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) and amending the terms of its pending tender offer to reflect the terms of the previously announced definitive merger agreement between Beacon and QXO, including to increase the offer price to $124.35 per share in cash and reflect such other changes as contemplated by the merger agreement.
importantArticles.title: QXO Extends and Amends Tender Offer to Acquire Beacon Roofing Supply

importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn. & HERNDON, Va., March 20, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) and Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) today announced that they have entered into a definitive merger agreement under which QXO will acquire Beacon for $124.35 per share in cash. Beacon is a leading distributor of roofing, waterproofing and exterior products, with nearly 600 branches across the U.S. and Canada.
importantArticles.title: QXO to Acquire Beacon Roofing Supply for $11 Billion

importantArticles.headline: ↘️ Accenture (ACN): The professional-services firm said its consulting business is already getting hit by the administration’s crackdown on federal contracting. The stock sold off, as did shares of other big government contractors such as IBM (IBM) and Booz Allen Hamilton (BAH).
importantArticles.title: Stocks to Watch Thursday:  Accenture, IBM, Tesla, PDD

importantArticles.headline: GREENWICH, Conn. & HERNDON, Va., March 20, 2025--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) and Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. (Nasdaq: BECN) today announced that they have entered into a definitive merger agreement under which QXO will acquire Beacon for $124.35 per share in cash. Beacon is a leading distributor of roofing, waterproofing and exterior products, with nearly 600 branches across the U.S. and Canada.
importantArticles.title: QXO to Acquire Beacon Roofing Supply for $11 Billion

importantArticles.headline: Building-products distributor  QXO  has signed a deal for  Beacon Roofing Supply  after months of trying to clinch an agreement, executives told The Wall Street Journal.  QXO has agreed to pay $124.35 a share for the roofing- and building-products distributor, valuing Beacon at roughly $7.7 billion, or $11 billion including debt, they said.  It marks the first big deal for QXO under founder and serial dealmaker  Brad Jacobs,  who said he plans to expand the business to more than $50 billion in annual sales.
importantArticles.title: Building-Products Distributor QXO Clinches Deal for Beacon Roofing

QXO has agreed to pay $124.35 a share for the roofing- and building-products distributor, valuing Beacon at roughly $7.7 billion, or $11 billion including debt, they said.  It marks the first big deal for QXO under founder and serial dealmaker  Brad Jacobs,  who said he plans to expand the business to more than $50 billion in annual sales.
importantArticles.title: Building-Products Distributor QXO Clinches Deal for Beacon Roofing
